name: Turn of Events
description:
War during the Chaotic apocalypse has been evolving. Technology and warfare has been rapidly developing to be able to combat the forces of Team Alpha. Can mankind fight competently enough to overcome the devastating forces that are set on destroying them?

Team up with small groups of friends in this "bite-sized" package, and fight it out in small-scale skirmishes!

Update V1.1.0 FEATURES:

- 12+ guns

- 4 different maps

- Satisfying gunplay

- Tactical movement

- Loot boxes (paid for using currency obtained through challenges)

- In game store (paid for using currency obtained through challenges)

- Character selection

- Challenges / daily tasks

- HUD customization

- 6+ grenade types
